title: Why did Merkel's military farewell include a song made famous by punk rocker Nina Hagen?
content:
1. Why did Merkel's military farewell include a song made famous by punk rocker Nina Hagen?  The Washington Post
  2. Germany honors Angela Merkel, who leaves chancellorship after 16 years  CBS News
  3. Angela Merkel to bow out with ceremony live on German TV  The Guardian
  4. With God, roses and punk, German military honours Merkel  Reuters
  5. Germany's Merkel at farewell ceremony: Don't tolerate hate  Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: メルケル首相の軍隊送別会で、パンクロッカーのニーナ・ハーゲンの有名な曲が使われたのはなぜですか？
为什么默克尔的军事告别会包括一首由朋克摇滚歌手尼娜-哈根创作的著名歌曲？
爲什麼默克爾的軍事告別會包括一首由朋克搖滾歌手尼娜-哈根創作的著名歌曲？
